narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Falls Church at 2025-10-03T21:57:47.977400+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to meet a friend.
behavioral_patterns: turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 8 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-64. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Falls Church, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 23 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing navy sweatshirt with white logo, black joggers, black boots) near Campbell.

provenance._fulltext: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Falls Church at 2025-10-03T21:57:47.977400+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to meet a friend. Within 8 hours of disappearance, movement cues left on foot toward nearby woods suggest travel west toward Blue Ridge along I-64. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Falls Church, Virginia. Around 23 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing navy sweatshirt with white logo, black joggers, black boots) near Campbell.
